thread.title: Sr Publicist - Sports Media

title: Sr Publicist - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sr Publicist   The Sr. Publicist of Digital Media will have responsibility for helping execute communications strategies in support of our Digital Media and Distribution businesses, including streaming products, web sites...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
